item.title: Terraform vs ARM Templates
item.description: Terraform vs ARM Templates Terraform ARM Templates HCL (2.0 in >v0.12) JSON Variables Parameters Local values Variables Resources Resources Functions Functions Modules Nested / Linked Templates Automatic depencies (via graph) Explicit dependencies Reference by resource name (or data source) Refer by reference or resourceId
